normal_attack.name: Normal Attack
normal_attack.description: Deal damage with a weapon or your fists.

heavy_attack.name: Heavy Attack
heavy_attack.description: Deal damage with a weapon or your fists.

move.name: Move
move.description: Move a number of units up to or less than your Speed value.

block.name: Block
block.description: Brace against incoming damage, diminishing the force of the assault.
block.trigger: You are about to take damage from an attack and you are aware of it.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.trigger: You are about to take damage from an attack and you are aware of it.
dodge.failure: You are hit but take only half damage.

grab_break.name: Grab Break
grab_break.trigger: You are about to take damage from an attack and you are aware of it.
grab_break.success: Target's attack fails and your reaction is refunded.

crawl.name: Crawl
crawl.effect: Move a distance equal to or less than half your Speed.

stand_up.name: Stand Up
stand_up.effect: You stand up and are no longer prone.

wild_strike.name: Wild Strike
wild_strike.description: Perform a melee attack that deals extra damage but leaves you vulnerable.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: Execute a wide-reaching melee sweep that strikes all targets in melee range within a chosen conical area.

blade_dance.name: Blade Dance
blade_dance.description: A series of fast strikes aimed at overwhelming the opponent.
blade_dance.effect: Perform a melee attack on a target.
effects: If this attack is blocked, dodged, parried, or lands true, you have the option to repeat the attack again for no additional action points.
This can be done twice (for a total of 3 attacks) before incurring the action point cost again.
This effect is interrupted if you take damage between the attacks.

limit_break.name: Limit Break
limit_break.description: A breathing Technique that increases your strength and coordination.
effects: Increase Power of all strikes by 100
Increase Speed by 1
Gain an extra Action and Reaction
Gain immunity to Weakened
limit_break.debuff: Receive 1 Hard Damage immediately after Limit Break ends.

tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.condition: Target is >= 3 but less than Speed x2 units away from you.
tackle.success: Move to the target. You both become Prone. Target drops anything they were holding.
tackle.failure: Move to the target but fail to tackle them.

human_shield.name: Human Shield
human_shield.trigger: You are the target of an attack while restraining an actor.
human_shield.success: The restrained actor takes 100% of the damage.
human_shield.failure: The restrained actor takes 50% of the damage.

parry_quick.name: Parry (Quick)
parry_quick.description: Ward off a Strike with a well placed countermove.
parry_quick.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
parry_quick.prediction: You anticipate a quick melee attack.
parry_quick.success: Negate the effects of the attack against you and refund 1 reaction point to yourself.

parry_balanced.name: Parry (Balanced)
parry_balanced.description: Ward off a Strike with a well placed countermove.
parry_balanced.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
parry_balanced.prediction: You anticipate a balanced melee attack.
parry_balanced.success: Negate the effects of the attack against you and refund 1 reaction point to yourself.

parry_heavy.name: Parry (Heavy)
parry_heavy.description: Ward off a Strike with a well placed countermove.
parry_heavy.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
parry_heavy.prediction: You anticipate a heavy melee attack.
parry_heavy.success: Negate the effects of the attack against you and refund 1 reaction point to yourself.

attack_of_opportunity.name: Attack of Opportunity
attack_of_opportunity.description: Take advantage of your foes' mistakes.
attack_of_opportunity.trigger_a: Target leaves your area of influence.
attack_of_opportunity.trigger_b: Target attacks another target, casts a spell, or otherwise performs an action that leaves them vulnerable.
attack_of_opportunity.effect: Perform a Normal Attack against the target without spending an Action Point.

deflect.name: Deflect
deflect.description: Use carefully placed mana to deflect a magical or physical projectile.
deflect.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
deflect.prediction: You anticipate a magical or physical projectile.
deflect.success: Negate the effects of the attack against you and refund 1 reaction point to yourself.

counter_touch.name: Counter Touch
counter_touch.description: Use carefully placed mana and a quick hand movement to prevent the activation of a touch spell
counter_touch.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
counter_touch.prediction: You anticipate the activation of a magical ability that requires touch to active.
counter_touch.success: Negate the effects of the attack against you and refund 1 reaction point to yourself.

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.effect: Perform a Normal Attack against the target without spending an Action Point.

redirect.name: Redirect
redirect.trigger: Successfully Parry or deflect an attack.
redirect.effect: Set a new target within range for the redirected attack.

disarm.name: Disarm
disarm.trigger_b: Reduce a melee attack's power to 0 as a result of a Block reaction.

kuzushi.name: Kuzushi
kuzushi.description: Use the momentum of a targetâ€™s attack against them.
kuzushi.trigger: Successfully Dodge or Parry an attack of Balanced, Heavy, or Grapple Tempo.
effects: Reposition your opponent to an adjacent square.
If the adjacent square is a wall then knock them prone instead.
If the adjacent square results in a fall, they must pass a dynamic coordination contest to avoid falling.
If the adjacent square contains an obstacle then they must pass a dynamic coordination contest to avoid tripping and being knocked prone.

focused_guard.name: Focused Guard
focused_guard.description: Adopt a defensive stance that improves your ability to block attacks.
effects: Gain the following effects while the stance is active:
Reaction Points + 1.
Action Points -1.
Power -50 for all Actions.
Power +50 for all Reactions

counter_strike_balanced.name: Counter Strike (Balanced)
counter_strike_balanced.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
counter_strike_balanced.prediction: You anticipate a balanced melee attack.
counter_strike_balanced.success: Increase the Power of their Strike by 25. Perform a Normal Attack against the target without spending an Action Point.

counter_strike_heavy.name: Counter Strike (Heavy)
counter_strike_heavy.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
counter_strike_heavy.prediction: You anticipate a heavy melee attack.
counter_strike_heavy.success: Increase the Power of their Strike by 25. Perform a Heavy Attack against the target without spending an Action Point.

counter_strike_grab.name: Counter Strike (Grab)
counter_strike_grab.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
counter_strike_grab.success: Target's attack fails. Perform a Normal Attack against the target without spending an Action Point.

counter_strike_feint.name: Counter Strike (Feint)
counter_strike_feint.trigger: You are the target of an attack and are aware of it.
counter_strike_feint.prediction: You anticipate an attack with the feint modifier.
counter_strike_feint.success: Target's attack fails. Perform a Normal Attack against the target without spending an Action Point. Increase the Power of that Normal attack by 50.

water_stance.name: Water Stance
water_stance.description: Through this advanced breathing technique, you heighten your senses, gaining an unparalleled awareness of your surroundings and an instinctual understanding of your enemies' intentions.
effects: Instantly recover all soft damage.
Eliminate all instances of Vulnerable and gain immunity to new instances.
You cannot gain Action points or perform any Actions while this stance is active.
You receive 3 additional Reactions every turn.
When any individual within range initiates an action, you discern their intent prior to choosing your reaction.
This stance costs 1 Mana each turn to maintain.
Upon conclusion of this effect, you suffer 1 Hard Damage for every 6 turns this stance was active, with a minimum of 1 Hard Damage.
